text: Bronislaw Bernacki (30 September 1944 – 12 November 2024) was a Ukrainian Roman Catholic prelate. He was the first Diocesan Bishop of Odesa-Simferopol from 2002 to 2020. Bernacki died at a hospital in Vinnytsia, Ukraine on 12 November 2024 at the age of 80.Помер єпископ Броніслав Бернацький ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1944 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Roman Catholic bishops Category:Ukrainian people
title: Bronislaw Bernacki
